page.title: 19People Who Help Us
page.content: Mr.Tim Abbott Architect. Our school is to be altered so Mr. Abbott came to tell us about his work. He has drawn the plans and he showed them to our class. This room will be a shared area for two classes. He said that the school was not suitable for the children. He showed us some of the instruments he uses in his work. Lucy, David and Derick drew a picture with the special pen Mr. Abbott uses when he is designing a building. {P.C.}Westmorland. He is our accident prevention officer he comes to show us the green cross code. He visits the nursery to talk about road safety and older children learn about bicycle safety. He helps students to be safe on their motorbikes, he visits old people asking them to take extra care near roads.
